name: debug
description: Debugging utilities, especially for LAMBDA objects.
searchIndex: debug Debugging utilities, especially for LAMBDA objects. ['debug', 'lambda', 'udt'] QSJOIN Query Smush Join. Uses QUERY to bypass Google Sheets' limit for standard string operations. REPR Creates a string representation of any primitive type or UDT that implements "@repr".

QSJOIN.definition:
=let(
    normalized, tocol(vector),
    query(
        arrayformula(normalized & if(sequence(rows(normalized)) = rows(normalized), , delimiter)),
        ,
        9^9
    )
)
QSJOIN.description: Query Smush Join. Uses QUERY to bypass Google Sheets' limit for standard string operations.

delimiter.description: The delimiter to separate strings with. Note that due to how QUERY works, a space will be appended to the end.

vector.description: A vector of strings to join.

REPR.definition:
=iferror(
  val("@repr"),
  choose(
    log(type(val), 2) + 1,
    val,
    """" & val & """",
    val,
    "#gsreserved",
    ERRORSTR(val),
    "#gsreserved",
    QSJOIN(, {"{"; QSJOIN(";", byrow(map(val, lambda(v, REPR(v))), lambda(row, QSJOIN(",", row))));"}"}),
    "#unknown"
  )
)
REPR.description: Creates a string representation of any primitive type or UDT that implements "@repr".

val.description: A primitive type or UDT that implements "@repr".
